attributes.action: hold the enquiry into the Iraq war announce on 15th June 2009 in public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Iraq war is the most controversial foreign policy decision of this government.  In this new age of transparency and openness we, the undersigned, would like the evidence to be heard in public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
